---
id: CancelOrder
title: 取消订单
sidebar_label: 取消订单
sidebar_position: 3
description: /spot/v4/order/{orderId}
---

**类型:** DELETE

**接口:** `/spot/v4/order/{orderId}`

### 限流规则

10次/秒/apikey

### 参数

| 参数名      | 类型   | 是否必填 | 默认值 | 描述     |
| --------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `orderId` | number | 是       |         | 订单ID    |

### 响应示例

```json title="响应"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "cancelId": "6216559590087220004"
  }
}
```
